title: @Reav3 Any warden or maurauder skins on the horizon ?

replies.body: Both sides need a mid laner to complete their teams, alas neither Reav3 or myself are on the skins team any more.

Does that mean some skinlines may not be touched on again due to the members on the skin ream
Also many of the current marauder and warden skins are not typically mid lane champions

Oh no I just mean you're better off directing at the skins team @kateykhaos @iZac @supercakes etc.

There are 4 wardens and 4 marauders. Currently each has a top, jungle, adc and support. So if we made more we should make a mid lane for each side.
I think back in 2015 I had proposed Cass and Katarina, but we didn't get another warden/mara patch that year or since.
Would a warden Viktor and Marauder Galio be options?
Probably not because it's been long enough since their last skin that they deserve something more than 750 and I don't expect Galio to stay a mid lane champ in the future, but anything is possible.
I get that people want higher quality skins for champs, but that kinda sucks to not go with an idea for that reason. What types of champions get 750 skins?
If we think that's the absolutely best idea for a skin for Viktor then we would do it.

On one hand, I'm glad you guys are shooting for higher-quality skins for these champs like they deserve. On the other, I'm sad Galio seems to be moving towards the top lane ;-; being a tanky anti-ap mid laner is what makes him unique
Yeah good point! Fortunately I'm not at all involved in Galio or how he gets balanced.
I'll just be glad to get an iron man chroma for full machine viktor <3 <3 <3

Well I hope it is brought up for this year 
As well as other skinlines
Project, arcade and pool party have gotten all the love what with it almost becoming seasonal 
What about the other skinlines like
Academy 
Headhunter 
Card deck
Woad 
And mecha/battlecast
They need love too {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 

I understand that skin team might want to invest in popular themes and creating new ones like dawnbringer and nightbringer which btw are my favorite skins of the year‚úåüèø
But damn I hope they spread out and touch more on other older lines
Man I would love to take another crack at Academy.

>
> Man I would love to take another crack at Academy.

Principal Swain... one day!

id use academy adventures as a good place to find good skins 
Coach {{champion:48}} rocks‚úåüèø
Do it.
Warden Ahri would be too similar to Challenger imo, just a different color scheme.

> Oh no I just mean you're better off directing at the skins team @kateykhaos @iZac @supercakes etc.

> There are 4 wardens and 4 marauders. Currently each has a top, jungle, adc and support. So if we made more we should make a mid lane for each side.

Cassio hasn't gotten a skin in ages :/
Nor would she be a good fit for either skin line.
It's not a mid laner, but I would kill for Marauder Yorick where all his ghouls are tiny barbarians.
Source?
Source?
The way you phrased it sounded like you knew who would be the new warden/marauder
Pst Kindlejack. Get the skin team on something other than project or arcade ;)
Gimme Warden Taric, that's all I want. Serious, well armoured, masked Taric with a low RP cost? My mace would throb.
**We need  more Woad, Headhunter and Hired Gun skins too!**

Damn straight 
We don't get enough of those skins 
Give project and arcade a little break
both are cool skinlines but a bigger break of both would be much appreciated.
The warden/Marauders skins will come later this year, close to worlds when they create some and it is the job of Kathey :D

Hallelujah
